summary: Removes Ability Perk Tree progression. A user can skip unwanted Abilities to specialize in valuable Abilities.
descriptionHtml:
Removes Ability Perk Tree progression. A user can skip unwanted Abilities to specialize in valuable Abilities. This does not remove skill requirements on Abilities.

This will not work with any mod that modifies Vanilla Perks. If a mod only adds new Perks, this should still work with it.
author: psychoelf
